main.title: Why Work With Me?
main.hello: a passionate frontend developer from Germany.
main.desc-why: With over 20 years of experience in web design and development, I bring both creativity and technical expertise to every project.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: I’m currently improving my skills and learning new tools to create even better web experiences.

testimonials.title: Need a Team Player?
testimonials.subtitle: Here's what my colleagues say about working with me

entries.name: Sarah Williams
entries.text: Working with Markus was a game-changer for our team. His ability to understand complex requirements and translate them into beautiful, functional interfaces is remarkable.

about.title: About the project
about.text: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

process.title: How I have organised my work process
process.text: How do you keep your code clean and maintainable? Have you broken the project down into reusable modules or components? Focus on documentation, naming files, variables, classes and testing.

team.title: My group work experience
team.text: How many people were in the team and what was your role? Describe your tasks in 1-2 sentences, for example: login form, dashboard or chat functionality. What technologies did you use? It is nice to mention good teamwork and cooperation.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.info: I'm currently open to new opportunities and interesting projects. Let's work together! Feel free to reach out to me. I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.

email.label: Email
email.error: Please enter a valid email address

2.heading: 2. General Information
2.text: I take the protection of your personal data very seriously. Your data is handled confidentially and in accordance with the applicable data protection regulations and this privacy policy.

3.heading: 3. Collection and Processing of Personal Data
3.text1: Using this website is generally possible without providing personal data. If personal data (such as name or email address) is collected on this site, it is done on a voluntary basis—e.g., via the contact form.
3.text2: This data will not be shared with third parties without your explicit consent.

4.heading: 4. Contact Form
4.text1: If you send me inquiries via the contact form, your details from the form, including the contact information you provide, will be stored for the purpose of processing your request and in case of follow-up questions.

5.heading: 5. Server Log Files
5.text: The hosting provider automatically collects and stores information in server log files, which your browser automatically transmits:
list: Host name of the accessing computer

6.heading: 6. Your Rights
6.text1: You have the right to request access, correction, deletion, restriction of processing, data portability, and objection at any time.
6.text2: To exercise these rights, please contact me by email (see above).

7.heading: 7. SSL or TLS Encryption
7.text: This site uses SSL or TLS encryption for security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content.

list.3: Host name of the accessing computer
